channel.title: Is this a good deal for a VPS?
channel.description:
24x7 HEROIC Support Two Free Domain Names (Registration for 1 year each) Site Studio Software CPanel + Fantastico Auto Installer 5GB RAID Protected Disk Space 120GB Premium Multi-Homed Bandwidth 5 sub domains Unlimited email accounts Unlimited MySQL databases Add-on/virtual domains are just $5/month extra (You get 2 for free, charge applies for additional ones.)
FOR $15 A MONTH!!

item.title: Is this a good deal for a VPS?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:13, topic:415382”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=517336.msg3759530#msg3759530 date=1316753419]

5GB disk space lol, my servers in my basement have 3TB ea. xD

Brb snatchin up yo hard drives.

myhosting works good… ive tried them, they worked good overall
[/quote]
Lol I got them from this best buy that was going out of business, 3TB drives for the price of 500GB ones. xD[/quote]
You know the drill.

By MSCP law, u have to give me half ur stack
NAO

Read full topic
item.source: Is this a good deal for a VPS?

item.title: Is this a good deal for a VPS?
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:8, topic:415382”][quote author=Kozs link=topic=517336.msg3759054#msg3759054 date=1316728378]

Sounds like a scam.

can we stop posting, its obv a Webhost not a VPS
[/quote]
the topic says vps. I’m not to educated in this area, but ik these normally go for 25-30$. If it sounds to good to be true, it probably is.

Off: don’t tell me to ‘stop posting’ for trying to help someone.[/quote]

I’m telling everyone in general.
